home.content: retikz is inspired by TikZ and is implemented using the React framework and D3 tools. It aims to help developers quickly draw SVG graphics.

tikz.title: Inspiration: TikZ
tikz.content: The design concept of Retikz is inspired by TikZ, implemented and extended using web technologies.

react.title: Framework: React
react.content: Based on the React16+ framework, using JSX syntax to express the relationships between graphic elements.

d3.title: Tool: D3
d3.content: Utilizes d3.js for assisting with mathematical calculations, graphic path generation, etc.
